name: CC BY 4.0
description: Appropriate credit must be given, no further restrictions

name: CC BY-NC 4.0
description: Appropriate credit must be given, and material may not be used for commercial purposes

name: CC BY-ND 4.0
description: Appropriate credit must be given, and material may be not transformed

name: CC BY-NC-ND 4.0
description: Appropriate credit must be given, material may not be transformed, and material may not be used for commercial purposes

name: CC BY-SA 4.0
description: Appropriate credit must be given, remixes must be distributed under the same license

name: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0
description: Appropriate credit must be given, remixes must be distributed under the same license, material may not be used for commercial purposes
